client_description.Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Nielsen Petersen Bjerregaard on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Having worked for over 38 years, Nielsen Petersen Bjerregaard brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description.Family Background: Nielsen Petersen Bjerregaard has been happily married to Josephine since 1997. Nielsen and Josephine have 1 child, named Alberte.
client_description.Education Background:
Nielsen finished secondary school at Kolding Gymnasium in 1982.
Nielsen completed his university studies at University College Absalon in 1986.
client_description.Occupation History:
Nielsen Petersen Bjerregaard is a 61 year old and comes from Denmark.
Nielsen Petersen Bjerregaard began his professional journey as a Associate Attorney at Plesner in 1987, laying the foundation for future success.
In 1991, he moved to Kromann Reumert to work as a Senior Associate, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
client_description.Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 4350000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has flat located in Helsingør, worth 1130000 DKK.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Silkeborg worth 2250000 DKK.

On top of that he inherited a beautiful flat in Ikast, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 880000 DKK.
He does not have any inheritances.
client_description.Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
